scripts.2gis:install: cat postgresql/partitioning/_2gis_partition_magic.sql | docker exec -i partition_pg_store psql -U marcus -d store -W
scripts.partition:init: cat postgresql/partitioning/init.sql | docker exec -i partition_pg_store psql -U marcus -d store -W
scripts.sharding:fdw:setup: cat postgresql/sharding/fdw.setup.sql | docker exec -i store_main psql -U marcus -d store -W
scripts.sharding:seed: cat postgresql/sharding/seed.sql | docker exec -i store_main psql -U marcus -d store -W
